title: Week 17 Matchups + Wheel of Shame, Win or Go Home - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/31
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a New Year’s Eve episode during Championship Week! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 17 matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, Andy has to spin the Wheel of Shame during the “Fantasy Faceoff” segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 31st, 2021.
  
 (03:45) - FootClan Friday
 (04:55) - NFL News & Notes
 (12:00) - Fantasy Forecast 
 (12:35) - Rams at Ravens
 (21:35) - Broncos at Chargers
 (29:40) - Texans at 49ers 
 (35:55) - Cardinals at Cowboys
 (40:15) - Panthers at Saints
 (44:10) - Lions at Seahawks
 (49:00) - Vikings at Packers
 (53:30) - Browns at Steelers
 (56:30) - Fantasy Faceoff & Wheel of Shame
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube

 Support the Show

 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
